resources.string: Activity shows lists of all albums you have on your phone.
Activity shows lists of all artists you have on your phone.
Activity shows current song you have playing on your phone.
Activity shows playlists you have on your phone.
Activity shows radio stations you have on your phone.

1) View all albums

2) The screen will display a list of albums 

3) The goal is to make screen similar to below image.
1) The screen will display artist information. \n\n2) The goal is to make screen similar to below image.
1) View media player\n\n2) The goal is to make screen similar to below image.
1) View current playlists\n\n2)The goal is to make screen similar to below image..
1) View all radio stations\n\n2) The goal is to make screen similar to below image..
